edu.luc.cs.trull
Interface Terminating

All Known Subinterfaces:
Combinator, Component, VisualComponent
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractCombinator, ButtonComponent, ButtonComponent, CarryCounter, ControlPanel, Counter, CounterComponent, EmptyComponent, Haltable, Pauseable, ProgressComponent
interface Terminating

A component that supports termination by notifying a TerminationListener. The termination listener is usually the component's parent in the component tree.

Method Summary
 TerminationListener getTerminationListener()
          Returns the termination listener of this component.
 void setTerminationListener(TerminationListener parent)
          Sets this component's termination listener to the given component.
 

Method Detail

getTerminationListener

public TerminationListener getTerminationListener()
Returns the termination listener of this component.

Returns:
the termination listener.

setTerminationListener

public void setTerminationListener(TerminationListener parent)
Sets this component's termination listener to the given component.

Parameters:
parent - the component to be used as the termination listener.
